alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 01 at 1:45PM MST until December 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...The Northern Front Range Foothills, and The Southern Front Range Foothills. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
